snippet: Readers condemn a letter from 47 Republican senators that seeks to undermine President Obama’s efforts to secure a nuclear agreement.
lead_paragraph: Readers condemn a letter from 47 Republican senators that seeks to undermine President Obama’s efforts to secure a nuclear agreement.

headline.print_headline: Outrage Over a G.O.P. Letter to Iran
headline.main: Outrage Over a G.O.P. Letter to Iran
